```{r include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
library(leaflet)
```


Hi there!


```{r, include = FALSE}
landmarks <- data.frame(
  lat = c(48.8584, 40.6892, 27.1751, 35.3606, -22.9519),
  lng = c(2.2945, -74.0445, 78.0421, 138.7274, -43.2105),
  name = c(
    "Eiffel Tower (Paris, France)",
    "Statue of Liberty (New York, USA)",
    "Taj Mahal (Agra, India)",
    "Mount Fuji (Japan)",
    "Christ the Redeemer (Rio, Brazil)"
  )
)

```


```{r}
leaflet() %>%
  setView(lat = 20, lng = 0, zoom = 2) %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(lat = landmarks$lat, lng = landmarks$lng, label = landmarks$name)

```
